# Usage:

```shell
gen activity:<activity> <path>
```

activity 对应要生成的活动模板，path 对应生成目录

比如在当前目录下生成米家活动 mijia:

```shell
gen activity:mijia./
```

### 目前支持的 activity:

- mijia
  - mijia_project
  ```shell
  gen activity:mijia_project ./
  ```

  - mijia_page
  ```
  gen activity:mijia ./
  ```

- miwear

  ```shell
  gen activity:miwear ./
  ```
